hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Morpha#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Morpha# holds...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Game Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path of #the hero#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Song of Storms#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Hookshot#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
